message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a price that I think is a great value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10,000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but $10,000 is a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I understand that $9,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $10,500.

Alice, I appreciate you being flexible, but $10,500 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  Let's split the difference and I'll offer you $9,750 for the product. This would be a good deal for both of us.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $9,750. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $10,250.
